rh-border-width-sm.description: 1px border width; Example: Secondary CTA or Button

rh-border-width-lg.description: 3px border width: Example: Expanded Accordion panel

rh-color-white.description: Lightest surface (light theme) or primary text (dark theme)

rh-color-gray-90.description: Primary surface (dark theme) or primary text (light theme)

rh-color-red-600.description: Dark red or brand red hover

rh-color-surface-dark-alt.description: Alternative tertiary surface (not available for use with context provider)

rh-color-text-primary-on-light.description: Primary text color for light theme

rh-color-text-primary-on-dark.description: Primary text color for dark theme

rh-color-text-secondary-on-light.description: Secondary text color for light theme

rh-color-text-secondary-on-dark.description: Secondary text color for dark theme

rh-color-text-brand-on-light.description: Brand text color for light theme

rh-color-text-brand-on-dark.description: Brand text color for dark theme

body: var(--rh-font-family-heading, RedHatDisplay, "Red Hat Display", "Noto Sans Arabic", "Noto Sans Hebrew", "Noto Sans JP", "Noto Sans KR", "Noto Sans Malayalam", "Noto Sans SC", "Noto Sans TC", "Noto Sans Thai", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif)

var(--rh-font-family-body-text, RedHatText, "Red Hat Text", "Noto Sans Arabic", "Noto Sans Hebrew", "Noto Sans JP", "Noto Sans KR", "Noto Sans Malayalam", "Noto Sans SC", "Noto Sans TC", "Noto Sans Thai", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif)
var(--rh-font-family-code, RedHatMono, "Red Hat Mono", "Courier New", Courier, monospace)

rh-letter-spacing-body-text.description: Extra letter spacing for small body text sizes
